Name: Chess Morph: The Queen's Wormholes
About the game: Chess Morph: The Queen's Wormholes is an original puzzle game inspired by chess. Control a lonely Queen with shapeshifting abilities and defeat the enemy army. Move wisely, explore the wormholes on the board, take the enemy shape and kill them all. Take your enemy form to move like them Use wormholes to reach different places Find the right path to kill them all Featuring: - Original puzzle game inspired by chess; - Each piece move like the pieces in normal chess; - 30+ hand-crafted levels with increasing difficulty; - Make wise use of wormholes to get to the right place; - Take the enemy shape and move like them; - Relaxing soundtrack to help you keep the focus;
